skill.name: The Cat Returns
skill.value: Restores 723/863 HP to all allies. Targets deal 36%/43% more DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: Feline Monster (Lv. 50)
ability.value: Slightly increases ATK speed of all allies.

ability.name: Anthropomorphic Cat (Lv. 80)
ability.value: Moderately increases the ATK speed of all allies when Socrates is on the team.
